FuncDef:
The spt-switch-threshold infinity command configures a DR on the group member side never to trigger an SPT switchover.
The undo spt-switch-threshold infinity command restores the default configuration. The spt-switch-threshold infinity command configures a DR on the group member side never to trigger an SPT switchover. The undo spt-switch-threshold infinity command restores the default configuration. By default, a receiver's DR performs a switchover from the RPT to the SPT immediately after receiving the first multicast data packet. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: IPv6 PIM view,VPN instance IPv6 PIM view
